headline: VICI Properties Inc. Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, December 05, 2024--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties") announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.4325 per share of common stock for the period from October 1, 2024 to December 31, 2024. The dividend will be payable on January 9, 2025 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on December 17, 2024.

headline: VICI Properties Is A Strong Buy Despite Rising Interest Rates
summary: VICI's stable cash flows, high dividend yield, and strong tenant portfolio bolster its investment appeal. See why I rate VICI stock a strong buy.

headline: VICI Properties: The Market Is Wrong On The Casino Landlord
summary: VICI Properties is a leading experiential REIT with a sound capital allocation strategy. Read why I maintain my buy rating on VICI stock.
